data.title: The City of Offenbach am Main: population, local time, code, ZIP as of 2024
data.text:
The City of Offenbach am Main in Germany (in German it’s Offenbach am Main)

Brief information about the city, postal codes(ZIPs), phone, area, dialling code, international prefix, local time, population as of 2023.

§ Offenbach am Main: brief information about the city

The City of Offenbach am Main, in German Offenbach am Main, with a population size of about 135'000 people is one of the largest cities of Germany, covering an area of 45 km2, the city is located in the western part of Germany in the federated state of Hesse (The capital of the federated state is the City of Висбаден). The population density of the city is 2'990 people per 1 km2. The city is part of the metropolitan region: Frankfurt/Rhine-Main metropolitan region, with a population size of 5.7 million people. Read more at all metropolitan areas and metropolitan cities of Germany.

§ Offenbach am Main population, population density

The table below contains the population statistics for the City of Offenbach am Main versus the mean value per 1 city in Germany. This gives an idea of the city size and its population. Population data is sourced from the Federal Statistical Office of Germany.

The population of the city of Offenbach am Main in 2023.

Feature Value Mean value per 1 city in Germany Population size, people 134'170 30'101 Number of men, people 66'650 14'771 Number of women, people 67'520 15'330 City area, km2 45 73 Population density, people per 1 km2 2'990 411

§ Offenbach am Main local time

The City of Offenbach am Main, like all other cities in Germany, has a single time zone, so the exact local time in the City of Offenbach am Main is the same as in all the cities of Germany:

Postal code(s) of the City of Offenbach am Main

The major postal code in the City of Offenbach am Main is 63065 (it consists of 5 digits, like all postal codes in Germany).

However, the following postal codes also apply to the city, depending on the city part: 63067, 63069, 63071, 63073, 63075.

63065

§ City of Offenbach am Main on the map

To open the map to view the location of the city, click the next button. To open the map in full screen mode, click the button at the top right of the map.
